attributes.action: lobby the Dti to enforce retailers to try their best to accept low-credit score debit cards (Electron and Solo)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some people are only entitled to Electron and Solo debit cards, due to credit scoring, which can be a lot of hassle, when it comes to certain companies... particularly train companies, (even when those transactions are online and potentially earmark funds immediately) such as ticket websites. Individuals deserve the same right as anyone else to the same access to goods and services, be it supermarket delivery or train tickets, yet such companies are not doing their best to ensure a comprehensive acceptance of debit card - and there really is little they have to do to enable this to be effective and include all!...
